templates.name: What is the purpose of a Spin Free Kit?
templates.content: Yukon Gear & Axle Spin Free Kits replace the failure prone and expensive factory unit bearings with tapered bearings and races. The result is not only a design that is easier and more economical to service but one that offers significant increases in fuel efficiency because there are fewer rotating parts in the drivetrain for the engine to turn. Less work equals better fuel economy. :)

templates.name: What is the difference between c7 and c7i?/ What does the i in the model name mean?
templates.content: If you see an "i" in any of our model name (C7i, M7i, V7i, ect.) that means that bike comes equipped with an internal hub. With an internal gear hub, the gearing system is encased in a sealed mechanism and the chain remains on the same gear at all times. You don't have to fret about the chain falling off, or dirt and grime entering the hub and causing damage. For the average cyclist, a quality internal gear hub lasts a lifetime if properly maintained. The real benefit to an internal hub is that it allows you to shift while coasting, backpedaling, or even at a complete standstill.

templates.name: Who is the Nolah Evolution best for?
templates.content:
The Evolution, our luxury foam hybrid, is our best-selling mattress. It features AirFoamICE‚Ñ¢ and HDMax‚Ñ¢ TriZone‚Ñ¢ support coils, combining cushioning comfort with targeted support.

The Evolution comes in three firmness levels, so you can choose the option that best meets your weight, sleep position, and comfort preferences. The Plush is great for dedicated side sleepers, and Luxury Firm is most popular with back sleepers and combination sleepers. Lastly, the Firm option offers even weight distribution and maximum spinal support, making it a good fit for heavier sleepers or anyone who prefers a firmer sleep surface.

templates.name: What kind of hair does INH Professional use?
templates.content:
INH Professional extensions are Double-Drawn from top to bottom, made of pure 100% cuticle intact virgin remy human hair. INH Professional strictly sources raw materials that are traceable & ethically sourced throughout selected Provinces of Asia under the Fair-Trade Act. 

The donors receive fair market-value compensation which allows them to care for their families and communities. Our donors maintain healthy lifestyles and diets in order to provide consistent healthy, quality, intact virgin cuticle hair.

templates.name: Is your furniture pet friendly?

templates.name: Can the Grill be used as a fire-pit?
templates.content:
The Grill was designed to provide an optimal experience for backyard cooking and is not designed to function as a fire pit. The Grill doesn't allow air to come through the top of the unit. This prevents the food from being consumed by the secondary burn, thus it would not produce an efficient, smoke-free flame like the fire pits.

The Grill has a more shallow depth than our fire pits, providing less protection from a bonfire-sized flame. It's designed to support ideal cooking temperatures (approx. 400-500 degrees) which are much lower than the fire pits, which can sometimes reach over 1200 degrees Fahrenheit.

templates.name: Difference in burning a wooden wick vs a cotton wick
templates.content: Cotton wicks will often "mushroom" or "bloom." Wooden wicks don't - basically, that means that they don't create an ugly black ball on the top of the wick that lingers and smokes after burning for a while. Wooden wicks burn much cleaner, and while they don't get the carbon build-up that needs to be trimmed off of cotton wicks, they will develop a slight amount of ash at the tip of the wick. The ash can be easily broken off when cool before relighting or cut using a wick trimmer.

templates.name: Can the Nira be used on elbows and knees to improve texture after Micro needling?
templates.content: The NIRA laser can be used on elbows and knees to help improve texture and skin appearance. However, after microneedling, it's best to wait until your skin has fully healed and any tenderness has subsided before using the NIRA laser on the same area. We generally recommend waiting about two weeks post-micro needling to ensure your skin has had time to recover fully. If you have any specific concerns, consulting your skincare provider is always a good idea.

Once the item is received back, a Promotional Code equal to the amount paid for the merchandise will be emailed to the gift recipient so they may purchase a different item on SteveMadden.com. 

The gift recipient may also return the item to a Steve Madden store (only stores in the USA excluding Colorado, Utah and Savannah, GA locations). Take the merchandise in its original packaging to the store. Make sure you have the order number or the email confirmation sent after an order is placed.

templates.name: How does Soltera differ from Pace 350?
templates.content:
Although Soltera and Pace 350 are both excellent ebikes for anyone just starting out with electric bikes or wanting to ride leisurely, there are some key differences between the two!

The Soltera is both for the commuter and casual city ebike rider. It comes in a single-speed version and a seven-speed. Soltera can reach a top speed of 20 MPH on both pedal assist and throttle and has a more aggressive riding stance, so you'll be leaning slightly more forward. It also comes in more color variances if you'd like something more vibrant or subtle!

The Pace 350 is one of our cruiser ebikes! It is only available in a Step-through version in both white and amethyst colors. Pace 350 has been a staple for those looking to combine ease with ebikes! It has a slightly more upright frame in comparison to Soltera, and also reaches a top speed of 20 MPH on both pedal assist and throttle. Although, Pace 350 is slightly heavier than Soltera, but not by much!

templates.name: Which nut / pre-slotted Nut do I need for my instrument?
templates.content:
We're not able to cross-reference the exact nut you would need based on the make and model of your guitar as the exact dimensions vary from instrument to instrument. To select the best nut for your guitar, we recommend that you measure your current nut dimensions (or dimensions of the nut slot if the nut is missing) and compare them to the specifications provided for all the nuts we sell on our website. Here are some helpful links to guide you through the process:
 
How to measure your nut to select a replacement: https://www.stewmac.com/video-and-ideas/online-resources/learn-about-building-instruments-and-kits/does-this-bone-nut-fit-my-guitar/

How to fit a pre-slotted nut to your guitar: https://www.stewmac.com/video-and-ideas/online-resources/learn-about-guitar-nut-and-saddle-setup-and-repair/how-to-fit-a-preshaped-nut-on-a-guitar/

templates.name: Do you offer old mattress removal?
templates.content:
I'm happy to help you find resources to dispose of your old mattress. Many people move their old mattress to another room, buy a mattress storage bag and keep it for visitors, give it to a friend, donate it, or even sell it. Here is some more helpful info:

Donate it!
There are tons of great places to donate your mattress. Try Goodwill, Salvation Army, or another charity of your choice. You might even be eligible to receive a tax-deductible receipt for your donation while helping out a great cause.

Sell it!
Depending on the condition of your mattress, you may be able to get as much as $250 or more. Prices for used mattresses could start as low as $50 and go up depending on the size, quality, and condition of your mattress. There are a number of great places to list your mattress (or other stuff) for free. Check out Craigslist, Facebook Marketplace, LetGo, and OfferUp for quick and easy places to list.

templates.name: How does a "3 For 2" promotion work?
templates.content: During any time of a "buy three for the price of two" promotion, the discount will be applied to the lesser-valued product. This promotion does not apply to solid gold products, stacks, or sets.

templates.name: When should I apply my SPF or sheer tint?
templates.content: ShadeDrops Broad Spectrum SPF 30 should be the final step of your skincare routine. After applying ShadeDrops, you can apply your Sheer Skin Tint.

templates.name: How many layers of rhodium are on a regular product?
templates.content: We use a proprietary plating process that is superior to any other similarly priced on the market. All items are plated with real gold and rhodium, however since we use a proprietary method we cannot advise the amount of layers there are exactly. We've spent years researching and testing to assure we provide only the best and will continue to innovate and set the industry standard. We believe in it so much that we give all of our products a lifetime guarantee.

templates.name: NAD+ injection therapy: How often can I use it?
templates.content: You can administer NAD daily and can continue treatment indefinitely.

templates.name: How do your lab tests work?
templates.content:
A mobile phlebotomist comes to your home or office to take blood, which we then take back to the lab for testing.

Once your blood work is in, we not only talk with you about your results, we can recommend a course of treatment to improve your health target. You will receive a full documentation of your test results along with an explanation and treatment recommendations.

templates.name: Sonicsmooth - How is this different from dermaplaning?
templates.content: Sonicsmooth is a 2-in-1 sonic dermaplaning system for exfoliation and hair removal for at-home use. Compared to the in-office dermaplaning treatment at your local spa, the Sonicsmooth utilizes 258 sonic movements per second, working together to exfoliate the top layer of skin while removing debris (build-up) and simultaneously removing Vellus Facial Hair (peach fuzz). The sonic frequencies help gently but effectively dislodge the barrier of dead, dull skin and debris in a way that a razor simply cannot. Sonic technology makes a substantial difference in the result, and this is why all the experts agree that sonic is just better.

templates.name: My baby needs to gain weight. What do you recommend for higher calorie intake?
templates.content: It can be difficult when babies have trouble gaining weight. Our White Bean Pumpkin Apple and Black Bean Sweet Potato, have 110kcal and 100kcal, respectively. Which is a good amount of calories for a puree pouch. But sometimes the key to helping babies gain weight is to add fat to their food. You can try adding some table cream to a pouch for additional fat and calories. For example, the Pea Basil is amazing when you add table cream (10%) and warm it up, served as a soup. You can also add a little olive oil/avocado oil/sunflower or pumpkin seed oil to the Carrot Chickpea or the Carrot Pumpkin. Oh another one is to mix in a nut butter to say the Carrot Pumpkin or White Bean Pumpkin Apple.

templates.name: Can I mix up the order of the food?
templates.content:
According to the trial design, the order and timing in which you eat each day's items do not impact the outcome. You can consume the entire day's contents in a single sitting, though we do not recommend doing so as you'll have many hours of no nutritional intake and you may get very hungry or may experience increased side effects from fasting, like headache and fatigue. 

Also, we recommend eating all foods in each day's box only. If there is any leftover food, or you forget to take a supplement, do not use it on a different day in the cycle, as this may impact the outcome of the diet.

templates.name: Difference between Arctic Aire Max Sheet Set and Active Comfort Sheet Set
templates.content: Our Arctic AireMAX sheet sets are softer than silk and thoughtfully designed with Sheex CoolX technology that wicks away moisture to keep your body cool and comfortable while you sleep. The super-fast moisture transport system and carefully engineered fibers allow you to stay fresh, clean and healthy while you sleep. Our Active Comfort sheet set on the other hand work hard when you're at rest. Performance fibers channel moisture and heat away from your body and maintain ideal body temperature for quality sleep. It's 2x-3x better than traditional cotton to facilitate faster evaporation, making sure you don't wake up damp or sweaty.

templates.name: Who is the Nolah Original best for? Should I choose the Original or Original All-Foam Hybrid?
templates.content:
The Original is our most versatile and wide-loved mattress. With a medium firmness level (5-6/10), it's an ideal choice for mattress shoppers who are unsure of their firmness level preferences. The Original provides comfort and support for most sleeper profiles; however, strict stomach sleepers and sleepers over 230 pounds will want a firmer option.

We designed the Original All-Foam Hybrid specifically for side sleepers and combination sleepers who gravitate toward their sides. It provides the cushioning, pressure relief, flexibility, and responsiveness that side sleepers need for all-night comfort.

templates.name: How much space do I need?
templates.content:
The GRIND Machine has a standard pass to the HS 3 pt line (about a 19 foot pass). To use all 5 shooting spots the machine offers (top of the key, both free throw line extended, and both deep corners), you would need at least around 20 ft x 20ft (but the more space the better). Some of our customers have narrow driveways and only us the top of the key as their pass spot and other customers who have "short but wide" backyards use the other passing positions, it all depends on your set up!

If the machine arrives and you find that it passes too far based on your backyard set up, then you can reach out to us and our engineer can help you lower the air pressure so the pass isn't as far. Or if you already know the pass will be too far, we can adjust it before shipping your machine.

templates.name: What is Grass Hay?
templates.content:
Grass hay is the tasty, soft hay that most small pets gobble right up and it provides just the right amount of fiber, protein, and fat. High levels of fiber are super necessary to help the digestive system keep everything moving as it should. Therefore, hay is absolutely the most important part of your friend's diet. 

There are many types of grass hay, but the most common are Timothy hay and orchard hay.

templates.name: What is the difference between the Ban Tang Custom Clinch Pick and the standard Clinch Pick?
templates.content:
The Ban Tang custom Clinch Pick is a handmade custom knife and sheath, made in the US. Hand-finished with a razor-sharp edge. This knife is for the buyer who wants the absolute best and not worried about the cost. Our standard Clinch Pick with good quality at a very good price point doesn't come with a razor sharp edge from the factory, but with a little sharpening and patience you can get it sharp. The sheaths aren't as refined as the custom sheath and may leave some black marks on the blade from use. The production Clinch Picks is fully functional at an extremely affordable price.

The difference between the standard and WPS Clinch pick is the Society Clinch Picks are specially engraved with the WPS registered trademark shield.

templates.name: My package was delivered but I did not receive my order
templates.content:
We would like to extend our sincerest apologies first and foremost. We take great pride in making sure you get what you paid for! To initiate locating your package, please follow these three steps below:

Please give yourself a full business day in the case the delivery carrier marked your package delivery early. Kindly, double check with any family members or anyone who may have picked up the package and forgotten to tell you. If you live in an apartment complex please check the parcel locker or with the management office. Lastly, reach out to the specific postal carrier to file a claim for a missing package to receive assistance in retrieving your package. Below is the list of links to our common delivery carriers and their claims pages. 

UPSP - https://www.usps.com/help/claims.htm 

FedEx - https://www.fedex.com/en-us/customer-support/claims.htm

templates.name: Does my Perks tier ever change?

For example, if you are at The Enthusiast ($250 threshold), and earn that level on August 8th, you have until August 8th the following year to reach the qualified spend level amount ($250) again - or your tier will reset to the Enthusiast. When you move up a tier, that erases your previous "earn date" and replaces it with the new date when you reached the newest tier. You have 12 months to maintain that newly acquired tier.

templates.name: Can I deliver to a hotel?
templates.content:
We frequently deliver to hotels! Please ensure that the recipient's name on the order matches the hotel guest's name or the name that the reservation is under. Double-check whether someone is using their maiden name or who the hotel reservation may be under. Depending on their security procedures, the concierge/front desk will hold the delivery for guest check-in or place it in the guest's hotel room. 

Nationwide deliveries for hotels will have an 8 AM to 8 PM delivery window. Depending on hotel policy, FedEx may have to deliver to the hotel's shipping and receiving dock. In some cases, this can cause the recipient to receive your gift several hours after it is delivered to the hotel.

templates.name: What makes the Siena mattress different?
templates.content:
The whole reason that Siena exists is to give you the comfort and support of a top mattress, but at a price that's much more affordable. We've focused on delivering a great night's sleep, so you wake up feeling great - with no compromise on quality.

The Siena is also backed by a generous 180-night home trial, a rock solid 10-year warranty, and great customer support. The same can't be said for most of the cheaper mattresses you'll find for below $500 online, which often have questionable quality and customer support.

templates.name: Proper Hydration: What causes muscle cramping?

templates.name: What is the difference between Auto, Lite, and Premium?
templates.content:
Auto is the simplest method to deliver your pictures either as email or as MMS (text messages). However, it has the highest possibility of the photos being considered spam by the email receiving server. On non-video-enabled models, up to four email/text addresses can be used. Video-enabled cameras allow only one.

Lite (available only on some models of non-video-enabled cameras) allows you to specify your own email server to send pictures. For example, if you have a Gmail account, you can set the camera to route pictures through your Gmail account.

Premium is the most flexible and reliable way to send the photos. In addition to being able to send photos to email and phone via text message, it sends photos to the Spartan Camera mobile app and the photos are also available on the Spartan Camera web portal, which you access using a web browser.

templates.name: How do cellular trail cameras work?
templates.content:
Cellular cameras are basically cell phones in trail camera bodies. They communicate (send pictures and status reports, and receive commands) over the same cellular networks that cell phones use. The communications are routed through a server before being transmitted to your phone or mobile device (using its carrier) or computer (via email and/or your ISP connection). The cell camera does not "talk" directly to your phone, mobile device, or computer.

The cell camera uses its cellular carrier and your phone uses its own cellular carrier. They can use the same cell carrier or different carriers, just like the people you call and text can use the same cellular carrier you do or a different one.

templates.name: How do I cut my wax into more manageable pieces?
templates.content: Cutting the container waxes is usually fairly easy. A putty knife or a kitchen knife work very well for being able to cut straight down through the slabs. The pillar and votive waxes are more difficult to cut through since they are harder and using a hammer and chisel is a common way to cut off chunks. You can also score the wax with a utility knife, and then break the scored area against a hard surface. When doing this, be careful not to cut yourself, and make sure the hard surface that you use will not be damaged. Check out this video to learn more: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H6RU-6AmhE8&ab_channel=LoneStarCandleSupply

templates.name: Why do you use Sodium Hydroxide in Butyrate
templates.content: Butyric acid needs to be buffered from its pH of 2.9. For that, the FDA recommends food-grade sodium hydroxide, an ingredient used to make pretzels, process grains, and to condition dough. Gastric pH is very low to begin with and using pure butyric acid would cause considerable distress. Therefore, we use sodium hydroxide, whose pH is about 13.0. This lowers the pH of the finished product to 7.9.

templates.name: How do I clean my 18k gold jewelry?

Don't keep it stored for too long though - it was made to be worn!

templates.name: What is the difference between clutch-type and gear-driven LSDs? How do they work?
templates.content:
When traveling in a straight line where wheel speeds are identical on both sides, all LSDs continuously provide equal traction to both tires. The difference between LSD types has to do with how this occurs and what happens when additional traction is needed. 

In a clutch-type unit, the spring array applies pressure to the side gears which puts pressure on the clutch packs in the outer part of the carrier. Both axles get equal pressure and both tires get equal traction. When a tire starts slipping, the clutch packs are engaged with different resistance. The clutches work to maintain synchronization between the tires, transferring more torque to the tire that has the best grip while reducing torque transfer to the tire that has less grip.

A gear-type LSD has no frictional surfaces to initiate torque transfer. It uses floating helical-cut worm gears that operate in pockets and mesh together. Under normal driving conditions this type of LSD acts like an open diff. When acceleration or wheel slippage occurs, axial and radial thrust is applied to the helical gear pinions in their pockets. Under these loads, more torque is transferred to the tire with the best traction in a progressive manner as torque is withheld from the tire that is slipping.

 All our products include our built-in absorbent liner - it's not necessary to wear additional protection. Our insecticide sprays are toxic to bugs but not people or pets, so they're perfect for use wherever bugs may be pestering you. Please avoid spraying on your skin or on your pets. templates.name: Smooth ID - How do I know if my screen is locked?
templates.content: When locked, the screen is inactive, thus you cannot change settings. If you are in HeatID mode, the temperature panel and only your selected hair profile inputs will appear when locked. When unlocked, the temperature panel will disappear, and all hair profile icons will appear. If you are in Manual Mode, only your selected heat setting will appear on the temperature panel when locked. When unlocked, all heat settings will appear on the temperature panel.

templates.name: Why does Swanson carry CBD hemp extract?
templates.content:
CBD is a non-psychoactive phytocannabinoid derived from agricultural hemp. Full spectrum CBD hemp extract has been shown to benefit overall wellbeing. 

At Swanson we are committed to delivering science-backed wellness products at the best value-for mind, body and home. Full-spectrum CBD hemp extract is just one of the many nutrient-rich wellness products we carry to support your wellness journey. The CBD hemp extract products we carry are 100% quality tested and have undergone an extensive review by our science and regulatory teams for compliance with applicable guidelines prior to ever being available to purchase from our website or catalog.

templates.name: Can I run in these?
templates.content: Vessis are best used to be a leisure shoe. Light runs and jogs are okay but we wouldn¬ít recommend any marathons or high intensity athletics :)

templates.name: How do I wash / clean my shoes?
templates.content: You can clean them easily using a water-based soap, and the one we recommend is Dr. Bronner's pure-castile soap. Simply run your shoes under warm water, then scrub them with a soft sponge. When you're done, rinse them off and let them dry in a well-ventilated area¬óthey will be good as new :)

templates.name: Are the shoes able to repel any liquid?
templates.content: They're 100% liquid-proof, however, keep in mind that they're not stain-proof and will need to be cleaned to keep them looking fresh, but they're super easy to clean :)

templates.name: What is the material of the sole?
templates.content: The outsole is made from rubber, the midsole is compression EVA and the insole is made out of foam. :)

templates.name: What's the difference between all your styles?
templates.content: The Cityscape is our lightest sneaker with a minimalist design that transitions you from work to play. It is designed with a tapered and slim silhouette. Our Everyday sneaker is your everyday go-to. It¬ís created with a chunkier midsole for additional lateral support and a higher laces cage for more footbridge support. Our Everyday Slip-on is easy to put on, and take off. We threw out the laces to get you out the door quicker. It's super lightweight, and great for packing into your carry-on! The Weekend has a slightly more relaxed fit compared to the other collections, it feels sturdy with less compression. They're all very breathable and comfy, you can't go wrong :)

templates.name: What is the weight and dimensions of the package my order will ship in?
templates.content: The weight of the box is around 1.7 lbs, while the dimensions are 33 cm x 22 cm x 13 cm.

templates.name: Are your laces waterproof?
templates.content: Unfortunately our laces are not waterproof, but rest assured this will not impact the shoes ability to keep your feet dry!

templates.name: Are they slip resistant?
templates.content: They're made with 4-way traction, providing the necessary slip-resistance you need for most activities. It would be incredibly hard to do the moonwalk in them, but take extra caution for icy or greasy surfaces :)

templates.name: Are you fairtrade certified?
templates.content: We manufacture in our own factories overseas which allows us to control every aspect of production including the work environment. While we don¬ít have official documentation at this time, it¬ís something we¬íre actively working towards!

templates.name: Are your shoes machine washable?
templates.content: Please don't use the washing machine on Cityscapes and Everyday's as this could damage the membrane and void the waterproofing feature. Your Weekend sneakers are machine washable though. Make sure to remove the insoles and laces first (these can be machine washed too, just on their own) and wash them in cold water under a gentle cycle. We recommend a mesh bag as well if you have it. Don't place them in the dryer as you can air dry overnight, away from direct heat.

templates.name: Are the socks waterproof?
templates.content: No, the socks are not waterproof :)

templates.name: Socks material
templates.content: Our socks are made from recycled TC Yarn 75%, 3075 spandex 20%, 100# elastic 5%.

templates.name: Socks sizing
templates.content: It depends on each person's preference but you can go with your normal sock size in other brands.

templates.name: How many times can exchanges be made?
templates.content: The same shoe can be exchanged twice before it's considered final sale. For example, if you get a blue shoe, you can exchange it for a green one, and then you exchange it for a red pair. That red pair is then considered final sale and can't be exchanged or returned.

templates.name: Are the insoles removable and can you use orthotics with the shoes?
templates.content: Yes, they are! Our insoles are removable to fit custom insoles and orthotics, allowing you to maximize comfort and support to your liking.

templates.name: Are your soles non marking?
templates.content: They're not NOT non-marking, but they're not made with that in mind so they might be :)

templates.name: Are they warm?
templates.content: They aren¬ít super-insulated as they¬íre engineered to be breathable, and while they¬íre ideal for cold climates, they are by no means a substitute for a super warm pair of winter boots designed to keep your feet warm for when it gets FRIGID out there :)

templates.name: Which style would be best for me? arch support
templates.content: It really varies based on what you'll be using them for, what you find comfortable, and what you like in terms of arch support, so it would really depend on your personal preference, however, the Weekend line has the most arch support while the other three are lighter weight in comparison. Hope this helps! :)

templates.name: The ankle opening is really tight/ They¬íre hard to put on
templates.content: It¬ís normal for the ankle opening to be quite firm at first in order to make sure no water will enter through the shoe opening. It¬ís important for new pairs to be snug enough to adapt to your foot shape over time. The more you wear them, the more they will stretch to accommodate and create the perfect shape around your feet. Not to worry, after a few more wears the opening will have loosened up to become the perfect fit for you. We recommend a shoehorn in the meantime :)

templates.name: How do you clean the Weekenders?
templates.content: You can throw those in the washing machine and wash them on cold. Do not tumble dry, instead leave them to air dry. Wash on their own and not with other items, and keep in mind that white styles do require a little extra TLC to keep them in tip-top shape :)

templates.name: Location

templates.name: Can I put a return in a box within a box?
templates.content: That won't work since the weight info on the pre paid label takes into account a bag and not a second box. Post office won't accept the package. You can place the shoe box in any plastic bag - even a few grocery store ones will do!

templates.name: What¬ís the grip like on the shoes?
templates.content: We added two-zone rubber herringbone tread design to increase frontal grip on the Everyday's, as well as side-to-side traction on wet surfaces. Our Cityscape's have a three-zone rubber tread designed for lightness and grip for both the city and light adventures. If you want the best grip, we recommend getting the Weekend sneakers! These are the strongest design of the bunch, made of full-length EVA rubber, making it the most slip resistant shoe! :)

templates.name: I have latex allergies. Are they ok for me?
templates.content: Oh no, sorry about that! If you have a latex allergy, our shoes may not be right for you since the midsoles are made out of EVA rubber, and the outsole is made of rubber. There is a chance that you would have similar reactions to the rubber material.

templates.name: How does the waterproof membrane work?
templates.content: They are 100% waterproof, sand proof, snow, and slush proof, as well as windproof - and it¬ís not a coating! Through research and hard work, we were able to develop a proprietary waterproofing technology called dyma-tex - a special knit made with millions of teeny, tiny holes in the membrane layer allowing for water in vapor form (sweat) and heat to pass through while keeping water molecules (which are too large to pass) from seeping into your shoes. This means the element-proofing will last the lifespan of your shoes!

templates.name: How long are your laces?
templates.content: They're 101.5cm! :)

templates.name: What is the material of the mask and how many layers is it?
templates.content: They're 100% cotton and consist of 2 layers, you add a 3rd layer if you insert a filter.

Our styles are unisex, with men¬ís sizes being slightly wider (1-2mm) with a bigger opening. If you're a female looking for a wider fit, picking a smaller size from the men¬ís line may work better. Just be sure to go one size down from your women's size to find your perfect fit. For example, a wide women's 8 would be a men's 7!

templates.content: Our shoes are not meant to be fully submerged, so we advise against swimming with them. While they are 100% waterproof, this is only up to the ankle opening and water may still get inside if you submerge it in water.

templates.name: Can I use styling tools on INH hair?
templates.content: You can curl our straight synthetic hair up to 400 degrees. First, let the curled hair sit in your hand for 5 seconds to cool & set, then let it go. Keep in mind, once you change the synthetic wigs that are pre-styled,  the original texture won't come back. To soften a style, you can brush it out without the use of a hot tool. If you want to revive a brushed-out style, spray it with water and shake the hair. Our 100% Remy human hair can be heated up to 320 degrees, and you can style it as you would your own. I suggest styling our extensions and U-clip before putting them in, to prevent tangling.

templates.name: Can I wash my INH hair and ponies?
templates.content: Yes! All of our products can be washed. I recommend using a sulfate-free shampoo for our 100% Remy human hair or a gentle wig shampoo for our Japanese synthetic fiber hair. Remember to only wash when needed and let air dry.

templates.name: How do I apply a wig?

templates.name: How do I cancel my subscription?
templates.content:
For security purposes, we are unable to cancel subscriptions for our customers.

Nothing to worry about! It can be canceled through your online account. To proceed with the cancellation, kindly log in to your account at https://simplyearth.attn.tv/sl/0HePiHkh and follow these steps: https://simplyearth.attn.tv/sl/C2d_l6YC

1. From your Account, Click on "Manage My Subscription"
2. A pop-up will show. Please click on "Disable Subscription Autorenewal"
3. Next, you will be given the option to PAUSE for a few months as an alternative. If you want to proceed, click on "Disable my box autorenewal".
4. Then, you may also be asked for the reason for your cancellation, you will be free to choose which one among the options and click on "Disable my box Auto-Renewal" to finalize it.
5. Once successful, you will be prompted with a message, confirming that your subscription has been canceled.

Please take note that canceling the subscription will only stop the box for that month if done at least a day before the actual shipping date. Always remember that you can always reactivate your subscription by clicking the "Resume Box" Button on your Simply Earth Account.

templates.name: Is PC derived from non-GMO or Organic soy?
templates.content: While we've tried to access organic, non-GMO soy, it's nearly impossible now. The agricultural trade of organic, non-GMO soy wasn't financially viable for many farmers and many have gone to the "dark side". So while I wish we could say we only use organic lecithin, this isn't the case, as we can't source enough of it to make our product. Luckily, the final product of BodyBio PC has zero presence of soy proteins - it's the protein component of soy that's allergenic and/or estrogenic. While we can't guarantee our products don't contain trace amounts of soy protein, we routinely conduct DNA and allergen testing on each product with an independent laboratory and see zero presence. We would highly suggest consulting with your local healthcare provider as well if you're allergic to soy.

templates.name: What does the term ‚ÄúCut‚Äù mean?
templates.content:
Some people think the cut is the shape, like round or oval. But it refers to how well-cut
the stone is. Well-cut diamonds appear fiery and brilliant. Poorly cut stones are dull and
unappealing. A well-cut diamond can make the stone appear more prominent than poorly cut
diamonds of the same carat weight. So you can see how vital the cut grade is.

templates.name: Should I buy SNOO or rent it?
templates.content: Let's weigh your options! It's smart to consider your space, budget, and whether you think you're planning to grow your family in the future. Buying SNOO might be the best option if you're hoping to pass it on to siblings, and/or you have the room to store it. Plus, with new SNOO purchases, you get to trial it for 30 days. However, renting SNOO might be a good call if you're only using SNOO for one baby, looking for flexibility and cost savings, and you want to opt for a more earth-friendly option. No matter the choice, families have access to our Sleep Specialists 7 days/week for support on their sleep journey.

templates.name: How long do these kayaks last? How many years should I expect?
templates.content: The longevity of a kayak is influenced by how well it is maintained. Regularly rinsing and cleaning the kayak after each use is essential. Additionally, using the kayak appropriately in the intended water conditions also plays a crucial role in its lifespan.

templates.name: How should I store my Aventure?
templates.content: Store your Aventure indoors when not in use. If necessary, it's possible to store your ebike outdoors if it remains fully covered. Ensure the battery, display, and any lights remain turned off. It's ok to leave your battery inserted and locked to the frame of your ebike when storing during moderate temperatures. In extreme heat or cold, remove the battery from the bike and store it in a temperature-controlled location. Finally, ensure you strategically place the battery keys as to not lose them.

templates.name: How often should I use the NIRA Precision laser?
templates.content:
Consistency is key when it comes to stunning results. The NIRA Precision Laser works similarly to exercise and muscle, it takes time for the collagen to rebuild, and the best results are seen with continued routine use.

For best results with the NIRA Precision Laser, treat your skin daily for 90 days or more according to the instructions. For possible enhanced results, you may treat twice a day; in the morning and the evening. We recommend waiting at least 1-minute before retreating to each area. Daily usage is recommended on an ongoing basis to maintain results.

templates.name: Can I use NIRA after a derma roller or microneedling?
templates.content: Dermal rollers, also known as microneedling devices, create tiny, microscopic punctures in the skin. NIRA lasers are intended to only be used on clean, dry, undamaged and intact skin. If you just used a derma roller or another microneedling device, please refrain from using a NIRA laser on areas of skin that are broken or punctured. Instead, wait until the skin is fully healed before treating it with a NIRA laser.

templates.name: How does Black Ginger work?
templates.content: Black Ginger is a powerful natural vasodilator, meaning it relaxes and widens the blood vessels in your whole body. Wider blood vessels allow more blood to flow through, so your organs and tissues get more oxygen, nutrients, and energy. That's exactly why the potential benefits of taking Black Ginger are extremely diverse-from improved men's health to better sleep and higher energy levels.

templates.name: How do I care for my AirFiber‚Ñ¢ Pillow?
templates.content:
Always use a pillowcase to protect your pillows from normal soiling. Refluff them daily to maintain plumpness. To further fluff your pillows, put them in the dryer with three tennis balls and run an air-only or no-heat setting.

You can machine wash your AirFiber‚Ñ¢ pillows on a delicate cycle using warm water and half the recommended detergent. Wash two pillows at once to maintain machine balance, and ensure the pillows are thoroughly wet before the start of the cycle.

After washing, tumble dry your pillows on a permanent press or cool-down cycle reaching no higher than 160 degrees Fahrenheit. Do not dry clean AirFiber‚Ñ¢ pillows.

templates.name: Do your products expire?
templates.content:
Some of our products expire, these are anything that has SPF and or is considered an over-the-counter drug (OTC) product based on its ingredients. These items are clearly marked with an expiration date. For products that do not contain SPF or are non-OTC, these items do not contain an "expiry" date. The end of recommended shelf life is based on our stability test which we completed to 3 years. 

This does not necessarily mean the product is bad or not usable past the 3 years; it simply means we did not test past that time. If you wish to continue to use of a non-OTC product past 3 years, we suggest that you look at the color and check the smell. If either seems abnormal, discard. If you find that both smell and texture seem to be fine, then do not have any hesitation in using it.

templates.name: Can the bracelet be recycled?
templates.content:
Every 4ocean bracelet is made from post-consumer recycled PET plastic, post-consumer recycled glass bottles, and stainless steel charms. All of these materials are recyclable, so, yes, our bracelets are recyclable.

You should know, however, that due to a wide variety of recycling practices by local recycling centers, it may not be as easy as tossing your bracelet into the recycling bin. We encourage you to contact your local collectors to find out how to properly recycle these materials in your area. We also offer our closed-loop program and you can mail your item back to us at 4ocean, 400 Hillsboro Technology Drive Deerfield Beach, FL 33441.

templates.name: Can I use the stove on (whatever surface the customer has)?
templates.content: You can use your fire pit on any surface, as long as you use a Stand. Our fire pits have a raised ash pan so the embers are never directly resting on the surface below. That being said, a Stand is required on heat sensitive surfaces, such as wood decks. If you plan on using it on a deck made of composite materials like Trex, Azek, Fiberon, Timbertech, etc., they have a manufacturer fire resistance rating from A to C. Check with your manufacturer or builder for what grade decking you have beforehand. To be safe, using a stand is required at all times when burning on composite and PVC decking. If you're curious about when to use a Stand, check out our blog with all the answers - https://solostove.attn.tv/sl/tf4vfxCL

templates.name: What is the thread count of your sheets?
templates.content:
Thread count means the number of threads in one square inch of your sheets. Here's the breakdown for each of our sheets:
 
‚Ä¢ Sateen Sheets: 276
‚Ä¢ SuperSoft Sheets: 248
‚Ä¢ Hyperlite Sheets: 200
‚Ä¢ Percale Sheets: 300

When we started designing our sheets, we realized that while we're taught to look at thread count, we weren't really sure why. Through research, it became clear that higher thread count doesn't always mean higher quality. In fact, more threads can actually make sheets heavier and less breathable.

We sleep-tested all of our sheets to find a balanced thread count that felt just right, so you'll sleep cool and your sheets will last night after night.

templates.name: What is the absorbency level?
templates.content:
Every flow is different. All of the products include our built-in absorbent liner, it isn't necessary to wear additional protection. It can also be paired with our double-sided pad, a sanitary pad, tampons or cups depending on your flow and maintenance of your leakage. All of our products have a proprietary woven blend of absorbent cotton. It's equivalent to about 2.5-3 tampons depending on your flow and maintenance, but, there is no such exact amount because blood/urine flow varies for everyone. 

Our period underwear absorbs 2.5 tampons, swimwear absorbs 3 tampons, double-sided pad absorbs 6 tampons when paired with our period products. Please note that these are estimates and depend on your flow.

templates.name: What differentiates the NIra Precision Laser from other at home skincare devices?
templates.content:
NIRA has developed the first and only painless at-home lasers that are FDA-cleared and clinically proven to visibly reduce fine lines and wrinkles in just minutes a day. It's important to note that the NIRA Precision Laser does NOT use LED light - NIRA Precision is an actual laser for home use. NIRA's patented laser technology is 200x more powerful than LED and 190x more powerful than competing at-home laser light technology.

Unlike competing at-home skincare devices, NIRA's laser treatments are simple, fast, and effective - and are a fraction of the price of in-office anti-aging treatments. The lasers are designed to be used on clean, dry, healthy skin - no messy gels or primers required! In addition, NIRA is proven safe and effective for all skin types and tones.

templates.name: I noticed that Glow is vegan, doesn‚Äôt collagen come from animals?
templates.content: Glow is not in fact a collagen product, it actually includes superfoods that help to support the body's own natural collagen production. Superfoods such as amla powder, rosehips, and aloe all promote collagen synthesis.  Collagen is a necessary protein in the body, however, our body's natural collagen production naturally begins to slow as we age so it's important to give the body the appropriate building blocks to aid in production.

templates.name: Is vitamin A water soluble?
templates.content: Vitamin A is not water-soluble. It's a fat-soluble vitamin, which means it can also be stored inside the body for longer periods, and isn't removed in your urine. For this reason, supplementation should always be carefully monitored so excess does not accumulate in the body.

templates.name: Can the healthybaby laundry detergent be used as a wool wash? If not, do you have a recommendation for one?

Because our laundry detergent doesn't include enzymes of bleaches, it is okay to use to wash these, however, it will strip the lanolin from the wool, so you might need to re-lanolize if you wash. 

We recommend hand washing the wool cover, not using the washing machine. It is likely to pill in a washing machine. Because Eucalan wool wash contains lanolin, it's a good option to wash your wool cover: https://www.amazon.com/Eucalan-Delicate-Wash- Natural-Unscented/dp/B001766Q5E/

templates.name: Can Fast Bar make me constipated?
templates.content: It's unlikely that the bar causes constipation. Constipation arises for many reasons, including dehydration, medication use, and lack of physical activity. The small amount of fiber in Fast Bar can actually help alleviate constipation when caused by insufficient dietary fiber. templates.name: Are your mattresses flippable?
templates.content:
Most of our mattresses should be rotated every 6 to 8 months but never flipped (or inverted). Our mattresses are designed with comfort layers on top and support layers on the bottom, including individually encased coils in hybrid models. We also use higher-quality materials that last much longer than traditional mattresses. 

The exceptions to the "no flip" rule are the Plank and Plank Hybrid mattresses by Brooklyn Bedding, the EcoSleep by Brooklyn Bedding and the Propel All-Foam and Propel Hybrid mattresses by Brooklyn Bedding. These mattresses are designed with varying firmness levels on either side of the mattress and can be flipped to customize your sleep experience.

templates.name: Can you explain the shelf life of your products?
templates.content: "Shelf life" refers to the length of time the product will remain fresh after you receive it. The Rooster truffle in our Collezione Italiana will remain fresh for 10 days. The remaining truffle collections have a shelf life of 14 days. All Vosges Haut-Chocolat truffles should be stored in the refrigerator until ready to enjoy. For the best tasting experience, bring truffles to room temperature before indulging. Other product shelf lives are as follows: Caramel Toffee & Exotic Caramels, 8 weeks; Exotic Chocolate Bars, 12 months. You may store these products at room temperature (ideally 67-69 degrees Fahrenheit). Be sure to reference the best buy date on the carton and product care guidelines in the Details & Care section on each product listing.

While we recommend a daily hand wash to maintain the cleanest conditions, note that you can place your bottle in the dishwasher. We also recommend that all lids be placed in the top rack.

Please note that this does not apply to any bottles with a metallic colored coating (such as slate, brushed silver, or ash rose).

templates.name: How do I care for my air plants?
templates.content: Air plants are low-maintenance plants that don't need soil or much water to survive. All these beauties need is a good soak in a sink full of water for 30-45 minutes every 3 weeks, starting after about 1 week after arrival. Xerographica prefer bright but indirect light, so place it near a sunny window, just out of the path of direct beams. Air plants are pretty tough and should be able to withstand the elements and temperatures from 45 to 80 degrees.

templates.name: Surplus Market: Do you accept returns?
templates.content:
Yes! We stand behind the quality of every Apolis product with a 30-day money-back guarantee. Please note, return procedures for customized and non-customized products differ. To keep things simple for you, we offer refunds instead of exchanges. To return non-customized items please note that items need to be postmarked within 30 calendar days of receipt for a refund to your original method of payment or store credit. Original shipping charges are non-refundable and items must be returned in their original condition (unused, unwashed, unaltered) with the original packaging and tags attached.

Please note that customized products are not eligible for a return unless you encounter a craftsmanship or quality issue which includes the bag arriving with missing rivets or a damaged handle, the print is smudged or the text is slanted or cut off. Please note that since each bag is handmade, there will be slight variations in jute texture from bag to bag; no two bags will look exactly the same.

If you have a question about whether or not your bag will be accepted for a return, text us (+20919) with an image of your bag and a description of the issue and we'll get back to you ASAP with an answer. If your bag does not meet the requirements above, a refund will not be issued and if you sent your bag to us, you will receive it back.

templates.name: What Does "Broadly Western" mean?
templates.content: "Broadly Western" indicates the Western-like genes that we've found in your kitty that cannot be defined to just one Western breed. This is different from the Polycat percentage, which represents unknown breeds or sections of DNA associated with mixed breed cats that are found in more than one breed group. As our database continues to grow and as we add more breeds to our report, the Polycat percentage and your cat's "Broadly" percentages will decrease over time.

templates.name: What's the source of your collagen stem cells?
templates.content: We are first and foremost results-driven so we use Multiple Human Cell Stem Cell (MHCsc)TM technology. It's derived from the combination of fibroblasts and mesenchymalCells and utilizes exosome delivery. Everything is sourced ethically. In regards to our stem cells - they're donated and from our cruelty-free & vegan cosmetic lab in California and are purified collagen stem cell media. In CELLRENEW & BOUNCEBACK they're donated fat tissue & purified collagen media so that's why they're so effective for scars & wrinkles. In our other products, they're plant-based stem cells. None of our products contain DNA or embryonic material.

templates.name: I have kidney stones and my urologist recommended that I drink water with lemon in it every day. Does True Lemon have the same properties as lemon juice for this condition?
templates.content:
We always recommend that you speak to your healthcare provider when considering health solutions for specific conditions. While we have never run any trials to test True Lemon's effectiveness in helping to treat kidney stones, a urologist in North Carolina conducted a month-long study of some of his kidney stone patients. Half of his patients used fresh lemon and the other half used True Lemon (the doctor provided the True Lemon.) After a month, he looked at pH balance and found the results were exactly the same for both groups of patients. 

We have heard from many people who have kidney stones and have successfully incorporated True Lemon into their treatment program. Again, we always recommend discussing treatment options with your healthcare provider.

templates.name: Will a mobile hotspot work with the Pod?
templates.content: A mobile hotspot should work as long as there is enough data for The Pod to use (300-400mb per night). If the Wi-Fi connection is interrupted, it will cause the cooling/heating to stop working on The Pod until the connection is re-established.

templates.name: Can the Power 266 be plugged into both a device and solar panel simultaneously?
templates.content: The Power 266 is capable of "pass-through charging" on specific input and outputs. The 12V socket can run regardless of charging status. When using the USB-C input for charging, the 266 Power cannot discharge through the variable DC port while in use. Similarly when using the variable DC port for charging, the 266 Power cannot discharge through the 60W USB-C port. For further detailed information, please contact our support team at support@gosun.co.

templates.name: How do I use the NIRA Pro Laser?
templates.content: Before using the laser, clean and dry the skin completely. Then turn on the device and select your comfort level. Begin the treatment by placing the tip of the laser to the skin and pressing the treatment button until you hear two beeps. If you feel warmth, the laser is working. Move to the next spot & continue this process until all desired areas are targeted. Once you are done, hydrate the skin with NIRA's all-natural hyaluronic acid serum.

templates.name: Can I take the T3 conversion booster with the weight loss bundle?

templates.name: What are the best tools for cooking with HexClad cookware?
templates.content:
Our pans are scratch resistant so feel free to use just about any metal spatulas, whisks, or tongs. Due to the unique cooking hybrid surface of your HexClad you might find best results using silicon scrapers, or thin metal spatulas to get under more sticky items like eggs.  

The use of sharp metal utensils should be avoided as they can scratch the surface of your cookware. If a scratch occurs, it is only cosmetic, it will not affect the performance of the cookware.

templates.name: How much weight is the Foundation designed to support?
templates.content: The Big Fig Foundation is designed to hold five times the weight of a traditional foundation! Our foundation will fully support the weight of a Big Fig Mattress along with the weight of one or two sleepers.

templates.name: What's the difference between "empty stomach," "with water" and "with food" in the directions?
templates.content: "Take on an empty stomach" means you should take the product one hour before or two hours after eating; you can take other supplements at the same time. "With water" means the supplement must be taken with water to ensure that you don't choke on the pill and that it's properly dissolved in the stomach; the product can be taken with or without food. "With food" means that the product should be taken at mealtime or with a snack for best utilization and/or to avoid stomach upset.

templates.name: What is Est. Savings?
templates.content: The Estimated Savings is the estimated amount of savings which is derived as the difference between the Estimated Retail Value or Start Price and Final Sales Price.

templates.name: What can I give to my sensitive pup?
templates.content: If your pup seems to be sensitive, I'd recommend the Original Catch-of-the-Season Whitefish Dry Recipe: https://openfarmpet.com/products/whitefish-dry-dog-food/ It's a single protein recipe (only whitefish) so it's great for dogs with sensitives or tummy trouble. Our dry recipes also have chicory root, pumpkin, and coconut oil to aid in digestion, and the recipes are made with quality ingredients like certified humane meats and wild caught fish which helps with your dog's overall health and well-being. While our recipes aren't limited ingredient diets, they only include the highest quality ingredients that serve a purpose for your pups! This way you can avoid any other ingredients that may not sit well with them.

templates.name: How do I know when the battery is low?
templates.content: If the battery is 50% to 100% charged when you turn on your device, both lights above the charging port will be illuminated. If your laser is less than 50% charged, the top light will not be illuminated. If you are about to lose your charge, then the bottom light will flash.

templates.name: Why do you use legumes in your products?
templates.content: Some of our products include a number of low glycemic complex carbohydrates such as garbanzo beans, green lentils, field peas and sweet potatoes. These low glycemic complex carbohydrates are high in soluble and insoluble fibers which are known to slow down digestion and provide a slower release of nutrients into the bloodstream, resulting in longer lasting energy and an increased feeling of satiety. In addition to the ingredients mentioned above, our products also contain a variety of fruits and vegetables to provide additional fiber as well as nutrients.

templates.name: Is the Temporary Wallpaper fire retardant?
templates.content: Our temporary wallpaper has a Class A Fire Rating. Fire ratings pertain to how quickly wallpaper burns in the event of smoke or fire. While wallpaper will certainly burn, ratings correlate to how quickly the fire may spread. There are three classifications, A, B, and C. To achieve a Class A rating, means that the wallpaper is able to withstand fire for longer than any of the other classifications.

templates.name: How much serum should I be using?
templates.content: Depending on how fine or thick your hair is, as well as how dehydrated your hair is, will determine how much hair serum should be used. As a rule of thumb, start with one pump for fine hair and work your application up from there. Remember it's always easier to add more oil than to take it away. If you are unsure, start with one pump, rub your palms together and then work the product through your ends. If you feel your hair feels near the same as before, double the application.

templates.name: Molding process
templates.content: UE FITS use our patented LightForm technology which uses light to mold the gel-filled silicone earbuds to the contours of your ear. templates.name: Does cold weather affect electric cars?
templates.content: Cold weather reduces the range of every car - including electric cars. But electric cars are affected more - ironically, because they are so efficient. Unlike gas cars, which use residual heat from the engine to warm the cabin, EVs use electrical energy to heat up the car and its occupants, which draws power and reduces range. You can reduce the impact cold weather has on your EV's range by ensuring its tires are properly inflated for maximum efficiency; using the "eco" setting on its heating system; pre-heat the car while it's plugged in before setting off on a trip; and using the seat heaters to warm your body to reduce the load on the electric heater.

templates.name: I want to paddle with my dog. Which kayak do you recommend?
templates.content:
If you're planning on paddling with your pup, our Beach LT and Inlet are the best options for you because they have a large, open cockpit that can accommodate you and your dog. Our Bay ST and Coast XT models have smaller, closed cockpits that make it harder to paddle together. If you want to paddle with another person as well as your dog, our Haven tandem model would also work well, since it also has a large cockpit.

However, please keep in mind that the Inlet has a lower max weight capacity when compared to our other models. Also, out of our 3 open-cockpit models, the Inlet has the smallest cockpit. Hope this helps!

templates.name: What happens if I completely stop using the NIRA Precision Laser?
templates.content: If you stop your NIRA laser treatment, you will likely start seeing natural signs of aging over time as new collagen production will no longer be stimulated. We recommend using the NIRA Precision Laser daily to continue stimulating natural collagen production for a brighter, firmer, and younger looking complexion.

templates.name: Can I use someone else's designs on your platform?
templates.content:
If you want to use someone else's design for your custom tattoo, there are a few guidelines. When you purchase a custom design, you agree that at least one of the following applies:

- You own the copyright to the the design
- You have permission to use the design from the person who owns the copyright
- The design falls under fair use. You can read more about fair use here: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fair_use

templates.name: How do I clean my Bevel Shave Brush?
templates.content:
After shaving, simply rinse your Bevel Brush in hot water until all lather is removed. Do one final rinse in cold water. For occasional deep cleaning, a gentle shampoo will suffice.

If you think hard water is causing buildup on the bristles (preventing proper water absorption), add 1 tsp of Borax to 1 cup of water. Stir the brush several times over a 30 minute soak and rinse thoroughly.
